body: Hi everyone, I'm Zieno12345. I was a moderator more than 2 years ago (2 years and 4 months to be exact) and was demoted after leaving for personal reasons, quitting MC (and Avicus) entirely. I've returned--for a short period albeit--for a quick AMA and some games on the server. I hope to reconnect with you all and have some fun :) With that said, AMA!
